2025-05-15.description: Trump added that India has one of the world’s highest tariff barriers but has recently offered to drop tariffs on US goods to improve trade ties.

2025-05-15.description: TDK Corp. is readying a new generation of batteries to power smartphones through AI tasks at a time that major client Apple Inc. is also preparing to launch a slimmer handset.

2025-05-15.title: Trump says he has a ‘little problem’ with Tim Cook | CNN Business
2025-05-15.description: President Donald Trump isn’t pleased with Apple CEO Tim Cook’s plan to manufacture iPhones bound for the United States at newly built plants in India.

2025-05-07.title: Apple looks to add AI search to Safari in potential blow for Google | CNN Business
2025-05-07.description: Apple is “actively looking at” reshaping the Safari web browser on its devices to focus on AI-powered search engines, Bloomberg News reported on Wednesday, a move that could chip away at Google’s dominance in the lucrative search market.

2025-05-02.title: Apple hit with pair of downgrades as tariff worries grow

2025-05-02.description: Diversity, equity and inclusion (DEI) has been losing with corporate America, with one big exception: the people who actually own the companies.

2025-05-02.title: Apple CEO says Trump’s tariffs could cost company $900 million this quarter
2025-05-02.description: Tariffs could add $900 million to Apple’s costs this quarter, Apple CEO Tim Cook said on Thursday, as he revealed the tech giant was shifting production of iPhones sold in the United States from China to India.

2025-05-13.title: Google Unveils Major Android Redesign Ahead of iPhone Overhaul
2025-05-13.description: Google unveiled the biggest update to its Android mobile operating system in years, weeks before its biggest competitor in the space, Apple Inc., is expected to give a preview of its overhauled iPhone software.

2025-05-08.description: Apple Inc.’s silicon design group is working on new chips that will serve as the brains for future devices, including its first smart glasses, more powerful Macs and artificial intelligence servers.

2025-05-08.title: From Apple to GM, Tariffs to Cost Companies Tens of Billions
2025-05-08.description: From Apple Inc. to General Motors Co., corporate America is bracing for tens of billions of dollars in damages from Trump’s trade war — and that’s before most affected goods have landed.

2025-05-01.description: The levies will weigh on the iPhone maker, despite Trump's decision to spare key electronics from the new import taxes.

2025-05-01.title: US judge rules Apple violated order to reform App Store | CNN Business
2025-05-01.description: Apple violated a US court order that required the iPhone maker to allow greater competition for app downloads and payment methods in its lucrative App Store and will be referred to federal prosecutors, a federal judge in California ruled on Wednesday.
